duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage incoming calls, including triage, opening of cases, and authorizing sessions.
Provide authorization for inpatient admission, outpatient precertification, prior authorization, and post-service requests.
Conduct a thorough radius search in Provider Finder and follow up with the provider on referrals given.
Refer cases requiring clinical review to a nurse reviewer; handle referrals for specialty care.
Process incoming requests, collection of information needed for review from providers, utilizing scripts to screen basic and complex requests for precertification and/or prior authorization.
Act as a liaison between Medical Management and internal departments.
Respond to telephone and written inquiries from clients, providers, and in-house departments.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Social Work, Medical Terminology training, time management skills, organizational skills. Experience in a medical setting, insurance, or behavioral health.
